Material used.Description: Binding assays were performed using recombinant LRRK2 protein.

Readout description.Result Description: Binding affinity decreased by 40% for the variant NM_000064.3:c.2019G>T.
Binding affinity decreased by 35% for the variant NM_000064.3:c.2020A>T.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 protein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Binding affinity greater than 80% for the wild-type protein.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Binding affinity less than 50% for the variant.

Material used.Description: Enzymatic assays were performed using recombinant LRRK2 protein.

Readout description.Result Description: Enzymatic activity decreased by 45% for the variant NM_000064.3:c.2019G>T.
Enzymatic activity decreased by 40% for the variant NM_000064.3:c.2020A>T.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 protein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Enzymatic activity greater than 80% for the wild-type protein.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Enzymatic activity less than 50% for the variant.

Material used.Description: In vitro kinase assays were performed using recombinant LRRK2 protein.

Readout description.Result Description: Kinase activity decreased by 50% for the variant NM_000064.3:c.2019G>T.
Kinase activity decreased by 45% for the variant NM_000064.3:c.2020A>T.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 protein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Kinase activity greater than 80% for the wild-type protein.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Kinase activity less than 50% for the variant.
